multiboilerplate-label: {{notranslate}} Empty by default. This allows the user to specify a for the boilerplate selection drop-down box
multiboilerplate-legend: Title of the form used for selecting a boilerplate in edit mode
multiboilerplate-submit:
The text displayed on the button that loads the boilerplate into the edit box.

{{Identical|Load}}
multiboilerplate-special-pagetext: Introduction text on the special page. Do not translate <span class=plainlinks>[{{fullurl: and |action=edit}} and ]</span>
multiboilerplate-special-define-in-local: Tells the user that the extension was configured through LocalSettings.php
multiboilerplate-special-define-in-inter: Tells the user that the extension was configured through [[MediaWiki:Multiboilerplate]].
multiboilerplate-special-no-boilerplates: Error message on the special page to inform the user that no boilerplates were defined
multiboilerplate-nonexistant-page: Error message displayed when the user tries to use a boilerplate but the associated page doesn't exist.
